methods.void appendElement(JsonNode node): Appends the specified node to the end of this array node.
methods.JsonNode getElementValue(int index): Method for accessing value of the specified element of an array node.
methods.JsonNode getFieldValue(String fieldName): Method for accessing value of the specified field of an object node.
methods.String getValueAsText(): Method that will return valid String representation of the container value, if the node is a value node (method JsonNode.isValueNode() returns true), otherwise null.
methods.void insertElement(int index, JsonNode v: Inserts the specified node at the specified position in this array node.
methods.boolean isContainerNode(): Method that returns true for container nodes: Arrays and Objects.
methods.JsonNode removeElement(int index): Removes the element at the specified position in this array node.
methods.JsonNode removeElement(String fieldName): Removes the field with the specified name from this object node.
methods.JsonNode setElement(int index, JsonNode: Replaces the element at the specified position in this array node with the specified node.
methods.JsonNode setElement(String fieldName, Js: Replaces the field with the specified name in this object node with the specified value.
methods.int size(): Returns the number of child nodes of this container node.
